title: Convexity adjustments \`a la Malliavin. (arXiv:2304.13402v1 [q-fin.MF])
abstract: In this paper, we develop a novel method based on Malliavin calculus to find an approximation for the convexity adjustment for various classical interest rate products. Malliavin calculus provides a simple way to get a template for the convexity adjustment. We find the approximation for Futures, OIS Futures, FRAs, and CMSs under a general family of the one-factor Cheyette model. We have also seen the excellent quality of the numerical accuracy of the formulas obtained.

translated_title: Malliavin变换下的凸性调整方法
translated_abstract: 本文研究利用Malliavin演算法寻找各种传统利率产品的凸性调整近似值的新方法。Malliavin演算为得到凸性调整模板提供了简单的途径。我们在一个通用的一因子Cheyette模型族下找到了期货、OIS期货、FRAs和CMS的近似值，并且发现所获得的公式具有极高的数值精度。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于Malliavin calculus的新方法，用于寻找各种传统利率产品的凸性调整近似值。在通用的一因子Cheyette模型族下，我们成功找到了期货、OIS期货、FRAs和CMS的近似值，并表现出了精确度极高的特点。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new method based on Malliavin calculus to approximate the convexity adjustment for various classical interest rate products, and successfully finds the approximations for Futures, OIS Futures, FRAs, and CMSs under a general family of the one-factor Cheyette model with excellent numerical accuracy.
